articles.description: Shares of the auto maker rose 14% after it reported more vehicle deliveries world-wide last year than analysts estimated
articles.content:
Tesla Inc. shares jumped Monday after the electric-vehicle maker said deliveries surged in 2021.
The stock rose $143, or 14%, to $1,199.78. The S&P 500, meanwhile, added 0.6%.
